sentences.cn: “ 日安, 老板娘, ” 新来的人说.

sentences.en: 'Pastime ,'said madame , still looking at him with a smile, while her fingers moved nimbly.
sentences.cn: “ 打着好玩的, ” 老板娘说, 仍然微笑地看着他, 同时灵巧地运动着手指.

sentences.en: 'see you,'said madame, " I care nothing for this Doctor, I.
sentences.cn: “ 你们要明白, ” 老板娘说, “ 我对医生没兴趣.

sentences.en: 'See!'cried madame , pointing with her knife.'see the old villain bound with ropes.
sentences.cn: “ 看 呀:”老板娘用刀指着叫道, “ 看那老流氓捆在那几.

sentences.en: " I have observed his face! " repeated madame, contemptuously and angrily.
sentences.cn: “ 我观察过他的脸, ” 老板娘生起气来, 轻蔑地说.

sentences.en: " It is true what madame says, " observed Jacques Three. " Why stop?
sentences.cn: “ 老板娘说得对, ” 雅克三号说, “ 我们干吗要到此为止?

sentences.en: " Madame and the others are sitting out there by the pond - "
sentences.cn: “ 少奶奶他们都在池子边乘凉 —— ”

sentences.en: " Madame Hester absolutely refused to speak , and the magistrates have laid their heads together in vain.
sentences.cn: “ 海丝特太大守口如瓶,地方官挖空心思也白费劲.

sentences.en: " Then tell Wind and Fire where to stop , " returned madame; " but don't tell me. "
sentences.cn: “ 那你就去告诉风和火如何到此为此吧, ” 老板娘回答, “ 别来跟我废话. ”

sentences.en: A bad business this , madame, of Gaspard's execution.
sentences.cn: “加斯帕德的死, 老板娘, 真不成话.

sentences.en: A little caviar to begin with, madame?
sentences.cn: 先吃一点鱼子酱怎么样, 女士?

sentences.en: Jacques Three pacifically remarked, " He is so much in your mind, see you, madame. "
sentences.cn: 雅克三号息事宁人说, “ 那是因为你心里老挂着那个人, 你明白么, 老板娘. ”

sentences.en: Madame Duras, il y a chez vous une profonde passion pour l 'é criture.
sentences.cn: 问:杜拉斯女士, 在您的作品中有种对写作的深深的热情.

sentences.en: Madame put her knife under her arm, and clapped her hands as at a play.
sentences.cn: 老板娘把刀夹在腋下好像看戏似地鼓起掌来.

sentences.en: On the other hand, this affair afforded great delight to Madame Magloire.
sentences.cn: 在另一方面, 这件事却使马格洛大娘大为高兴.

trans.tran_cn: <法>（用于已婚妇女姓名前的尊称）太太，夫人，女士
